description: This file defines a TransactionRepository class for accessing and managing transaction and budget goal data within an Android application. It interacts with the AppDatabase to perform database operations such as retrieving all transactions, adding new transactions, computing totals, filtering transactions, and fetching goals.

classes.name: TransactionRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling transaction and goal data operations, providing a public interface for accessing and manipulating financial data.

methods.name: allTransactions
methods.description: Returns a flow of all transaction entities from the database.

methods.name: addTransaction
methods.description: Suspending function to insert a new transaction entity into the database.

methods.name: totals
methods.description: Computes and returns a flow of total income, expenses, and balance as a Totals object.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Returns transactions filtered by type and/or category.

methods.name: goals
methods.description: Retrieves a flow of all budget goal entities.
